bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Pedro Nogueira, November 13, 1952

div1.p: Hench informs Nogueira that Ames' widow would like to attend the dedication ceremony of Camp Lazear.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Pedro Nogueira, November 13, 1952
div1.opener:
November 13, 1952
Dr. Pedro Nogueira
Marti 219, Marianao
Havana, Cuba
My dear Pedro:
div1.p:
I notified Mrs. Ames (Dr. Ames' widow) of the
impending dedication of Camp Lazear as you
suggested. I believe I sent you her address.

I am delighted to say that this morning I have
heard from her. She had planned to visit rela-
tives in Havana in January but in view of the
dedication of Camp Lazear she would now rather
go down in December. I believe you were in-
tending to send her an invitation. She would
certainly appreciate one. It will be a real
pleasure for her to see that our Cuban friends
have honored her husband in this way.
div1.closer:
Sincerely, P. S. Hench, M.D. PSH: alc
Copy sent to Mrs. Ames
